snippet: Jihadists stormed a hotel where United Nations staff members were staying, seizing hostages and killing at least six people.
abstract: Malian government forces continue operation to free hostages seized during jihadist assault of Byblos hotel in Sevare where United Nations staffers were lodging; UN contractor and at least five Malian soldiers were killed and government forces have detained seven suspects so far.
lead_paragraph: Jihadists stormed a hotel where United Nations staff members were staying, seizing hostages and killing at least six people.

headline.main: Mali: Militants Seize Hostages at a Hotel
headline.print_headline: Africa; Mali: Militants Seize Hostages at a Hotel
